content.title: Intro
content.content:
1959
Preceded by
1959
1960
Year
1961
Followed by
1961
You may also be looking for Third Age 1960.

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1960.

content.title: January
content.content: 13 - J.R.R. Tolkien sends a letter to Elizabeth Jones.

content.title: February
content.content:
9 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 222a.
12 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 222b.
29 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 222c.

content.title: March
content.content:
1 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 222d.
17 - Jef Murray is born.

content.title: April
content.content:
4 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 222e.
4 - Hugo Weaving, who would play Elrond in The Lord of the Rings (film series), is born.

content.title: May
content.content:
5 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 222f.
? - Triode 18, including a letter by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
7 - Tolkien writes a letter to H.W. Donner.
9 - Tolkien has a formal dinner in Cambridge.
31 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 223.

content.title: September
content.content:
4 - The Fellowship of the Ring becomes formally constituted.
12 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 224.
23 - Jason Carter, who would voice Glorfindel in EA's The Battle for Middle-earth II and The Rise of the Witch-king, is born.

content.title: October
content.content: 25 - J.R.R. Tolkien seeks to publish "The End of Bovadium".

content.title: December
content.content:
10 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 225.
14 - J.R.R. Tolkien draws Idril Celebrindal's heraldic device.
31 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 226.

? - I.L. Gordon publishes an edition of the Old English poem The Seafarer, to which J.R.R. Tolkien contributed.
? - The Four Loves, a book by C.S. Lewis with a reference to J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.
? - Actor Peter Hambleton is born.
Years
1957 1958 1959 1960 1961 1962 1963
